item.title: OKTAGON 36
item.description:
via oktagon.tv via Bild+: https://www.bild.de/bild-plus/sport/mehr-sport/sport-mix/mma-oktagon-36-exklusiv-bei-bild-hier-anmelden-und-die-eckerlin-rache-sehen-81550056.bild.html

https://www.tapology.com/fightcenter/events/91181-oktagon-36 http://www.sherdog.com/events/oktagon-mma-oktagon-36-93387 https://events.mixedmartialarts.com/oktagon-36:e6e40109-58ac-4e6e-9efe-25e25b849a23 https://oktagonmma.cz/event/oktagon-36/
---
Main Event: Christian Eckerlin (14-5-0) vs. Denilson Neves (16-8-0) Co-Main Event: Jeremy Kimball (18-9-0) vs. Hatef Moeil (12-4-0) Main Card: Stephan Puetz (21-5-0) vs. Miloš Petrášek (12-6-0) Main Card: Bojan Velickovic (21-11-2) vs. Leandro Silva (25-10-1) Main Card: Zdenek Polivka (8-5-0) vs. Samuel Krištofič (15-4-0) Main Card: Máté Kertész (12-5-0) vs. Christian Jungwirth (12-5-0) Prelim: André Ricardo (11-5-2) vs. John Hathaway (17-2-0) Main Card: Nermin Hajdarpašić (4-0-0) vs. Alexander Poppeck (14-4-0) Prelim: Václav Mikulášek (7-9-0) vs. Hojat Khajevand (5-3-0) Prelim: Marek Bartl (10-11-0) vs. Ebrahim Hosseinpour (6-6-0) Prelim: Katharina Dalisda (6-3-0) vs. Mallory Martin (7-5-0) Prelim: Jakub Bahník (8-4-0) vs. Jamie Cordero (2-0-0)
